text: Ordered a jewel heart jelly cake very last minute a day before and staff Ron Karlo took in my order and arranged for next day delivery. Though there was a slight hiccup over delivery timing on a Sunday to outlet, it was resolved and Ron assured me he would try his best to see I receive at the timing I needed. Thankful for going extra mile to fulfill the order. Everyone love the jelly fruits at my family birthday celebration!

1st time order this heart biscuit from TJH to gift to my colleagues. find it not too sweet, just nice. and it serves as good snacks to put in office for a time when feeling hungry or peckish for a bite.
The staff was very friendly and was kind enough to introduce the various different flavours to me. The cake looks perfect and it's neatly cut. Really can't wait to eat this.

Just ordered a JellyHearts cake for a birthday celebration. I love how everyone gets a square of strawberry and cheescake goodness! It's nice to look at and good to eat. All my guests were delighted. Definitely my go-to cake order delivery for future gatherings.
we got free samples. with that samples, we bought 4 boxes !! they had a buy 3 get 1 free promo. so worth it. worth the try ! customer service was awesomeee
